title: DATS Dataset Schema
description: A set of dimensions about an entity being observed. A collection of data, published or curated by a single agent, and available for access or download in one or more formats (from DCAT: http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/#Class:_Dataset). A body of structured information describing some topic(s) of interest (from: http://schema.org/Dataset).

title.description: The name of the dataset, usually one sentece or short description of the dataset.

description.description: A textual narrative comprised of one or more statements describing the dataset.

dates.description: Relevant dates for the datasets, at a minimum, creation date needs to be added

types.description: A term, ideally from a controlled terminology, identifying the dataset type or nature of the data, placing it in a typology

distributions.description: The distribution(s) by which datasets are made available (for example: mySQL dump).

dimensions.description: The different dimensions (granular components)  making up a dataset.

isCitedBy.description: The relevant publication(s) describing how the dataset was produced or used.

producedBy.description: A study process which generated a given dataset, if any.

creators.description: The person(s) or organization(s) which contributed to the creation of the dataset.

isAboutBiologicalEntity.description: A biological entity (.i.e. is a recognized entity covering biological process, molecular functions or cellular components (from: http://geneontology.org/)) this dataset is about.

hasPart.description: A Dataset that is a subset of this Dataset; Datasets declaring the 'hasPart' relationship are considered a collection of Datasets, the aggregation criteria could be included in the 'description' field.

keywords.description: Tags associated with the dataset, which will help in its discovery.
